DOC.brief_summary: Supraglottic airway device ( SGA ) become routine part daily anesthesia practice . use primary airway device conduit endoracheal intubation become integral part recent guideline manage difficult airway . Air-Q ILA use successfully 1ry airway also conduits endotracheal intubation . The Ambu® Aura-i TM laryngeal mask new disposable SGA claim special advantage competitor study conduit endoracheal intubation . This study design compare performance Ambu®Aura-i™ laryngeal mask air-Q ILA conduit fiberoptic-guided tracheal intubation adult population .
DOC.brief_title: Ambu Aura-i Laryngeal Mask Versus Air-Q Intubating Laryngeal Airway Tracheal Intubation Adults
DOC.criteria: patient age 1860 year old , ASA I II schedule elective surgery general anesthesia history cardiopulmonary disease , gastroesophageal reflux disease , abnormal airway anatomy , body mass index > 30 kg.m2 , surgical procedure include head neck perform position supine lithotomy
